review_text: Very helpful, very informative and very inspiring.

Nice presentation. Helpful tips and new ideas to write an effective book.
Worthwhile course!

The only problem is
I was not able to download the accompanying PDFÂ´s.
Although it is not for writers of future writers, but rather for people who will end up hiring a ghostwriter, you have all the basic knowledge to get started.
Liked the course, nicely paced. It was about 70% valuable information, 30% infomercial for Fiverr. But I like Fiverr so that's okay!

Thanks for a great course.  I loved the way you structured the ideas.  I enjoyed the quiz feature, it helped me to realize that I was not just hearing the words but actually listening and absorbing the information.  The information was clear and concise.  I had the misconception that if I hired a ghostwriter it would be cheating as it would no longer be my work.  I see now that this is not true.  Thank you for the help,  I think that this will be a course that I can refer back to again and again.

Billy is very clear and encouraging. I would definitely recommend the course to first-time writers (I am one!).

Couple of things to improve: properly name the downloadable files (indicating what the file content is, rather than ATTACHMENT 1, ATTACHMENT 2...) so that it's easy to identify what's in them by looking at the link. Related to this, add the downloadable files in the chapter that they belong too, rather than all together at the beginning without really explaining whether we need to read them at the start or what. It's a bit messy.

It also seemed to me that there was a plug for a Fiverr gig in every single chapter. Some of them were actually relevant, such as recommendations on editing or proofreading, but some others seemed absolutely out of the blue. Way too salesy at times. Understood if this was a free video, but it's a paid course and I don't want irrelevant ads prompting me to buy stuff on fiverr in every chapter.

With those aside. I overall enjoyed the course and it gave me a few tips to move forward with my writing.
Good tips on the steps to write a book
Good content in this course
It was easy and basic. Just enough Info to Keep me motivated ..but not overwhelming.
From being a musician I already have it in my blood to write, I learned lots of new pointers an tips to make myself stand out an become successful with what I love

So this course was easy to understand, relatable on a personal level (I found myself nodding in agreement to most of what Billy said) I learned a lot and there's no doubt that I will be referencing back to some of the points in this course in the future. I like how Billy gave a bonus chapter and book recommendations  and materials that I will be reading  and researching ASAP. BUT!  I have one peeve. The pdfs. I cant find them. I got the first six. Those were in the first chapters. The others I can't seem to find. I'm high off my enthusiasm about the info in this course so I want to gobble up all I can. I need to the pdfs. Please and thanks. 
Otherwise, this was an amazing course. 
Thanks Billy
The content is missing some zing. I wish it were punchier. That being said, all the ideas are presented logically and cohesively.

It was undoubtedly a course full of knowledge and wisdom. I loved the way he was telling everything so calmly and it was just too easy to absorb it all. I highly recommend people to enroll in this course.
Very insightful

The content was very well thought out and organized. Billy gave a great general insight on writing an e-book/ book and squeezed in a few tips and tricks.  I appreciated his tone as he was very confident and professional and it shined through the course.
As a budding ghostwriter, I find the content in this course to be quite helpful. The lectures are clear and well-organized. 100% recommended!
Easy to follow and great practical tips. I really enjoyed the course.

The course was very informative. I did feel it was a comprehensive overview of the writing and self-publishing process. However it seemed to have more about the writing process than the publishing. The title inclined me to think it would contain more about the nuts and bolts of self-publishing. Not misleading, but could be better titled as an overview of both. I have my first small ebook ready and a full book in the works. The course was true to the hurdles and issues I have encountered and has excellent input on the writing process. I especially liked the address of advertising and understanding influence. I highly recommend the course.
I loved this course. Honest and practical
its Amazing
Great course! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your knowledge.
This was so thorough and enlightening. All of my questions were answered and I thoroughly enjoyed this course. Thank you!
It was good
This was a great course to follow. Really liked how Billy explained everything, used good examples and included materials related to the topics. Excellent value, thank you.
Well worth it.  Very good guidance.  Inspirational.
Nice course, keep up the good work.
This course lacks value. While there were a few mediocre takeaways, it was not worth the asking price. Overall, it was disappointing.
Complete and simple!
Amazing content, thank you so much for providing such valuable tools and information.

I am an outliner and ghostwriter on Fiverr, and I've been very successful in my last two years of business. I saw this course advertised to me, and Fiverr promised me a badge if I took it, so I was like, "Hey, why not? I might learn a thing or two."

My first issue right off the bat with the course is that Billy McIntyre does not speak to the correct audience. He doesn't speak to a Fiverr ghostwriter, explaining the process of ghostwriting for clients. He speaks to a client that is seeking to publish a book. This means there are times he says things like, "Check out Fiverr to find the right ghostwriter for you." As a Fiverr ghostwriter myself, this was not directly connected to me as I wished.

My second issue was that he goes over very generic tips. He doesn't walk you through writing tips or how to ghostwrite (which I found odd since he's a professional ghostwriter). Instead, he provides basic tips that most writers have probably already known like "Try Grammarly," and "Use an outline."

Overall, the information wasn't bad, and I do appreciate the books he showed at the end of the course, as they are all very highly rated and worth a read, but it wasn't what I was hoping for in the course. The course subtitle says "Learn how to write a book..." but I don't think I learned any valuable writing advice. I did learn a few things about marketing, but that's about it. I wish the course was directed more towards Fiverr sellers like myself that want to sharpen their ghostwriting skills. If that's what you're expecting, it's probably not the course for you.

I'm not trying to hate on the course. There were a few things I found helpful. It's just a deceiving title that disappointed me. I guess the course is worth the $40 though. At least you get a badge on your account.
There were some key eelemnts I found quite interesting and useful in order to write my book.
Great course!
This is very Important

I never thought I would enjoy this course as much as I did. So much so I almost cried. He takes you from start to finish on the ins and outs of self publishing your book, but mind you, it's only the barest of bones information. He takes you on a wideview journey of getting your book self published for any book, from instructional to novel. 
Don't go into this course thinking you're going to get advice on would-building or character development, that's what I'm here for. (Search "getting your story out" gig by imontano on Fiverr. ) But he does give you awesome encouragement and straight talk on what it takes to self publish your book. I cannot recommend this course enough.

I was hoping for more content on the practicalities of ebook publishing - like formatting, best programs to use, different e-platforms/e-marketplaces, etc. This focused more on the 101 for writing for people that had next to no experience. A good course if you need direction on the very basics, but probably not a lot of value if you are looking for the next layer down.
Excellent communication, profound delivery, worth every penny.
I am getting some great ideas to follow and it has made me more interested in writing my book that has been just an idea for the past 20 years
I will say this is a great course, but I did think I was getting a course of how to BE a ghostwriter. So my fault for not reading closer.  Great course though.
Fun and informative.
Amazing and informative course.  Thank you very much : )
Amazing course!!!
Very informative and organized!
Content is rich and simple to understand but requires more focus throughout the course as there are limited captions or visuals in the course presentation.
Well-organized and delivered content.  Thank you so much for putting it together.
Good course!

This was a clear, to the point course, I actually got much more out of it than I expected. I have been a freelance writer for some time, and I didn't expect to get much from it, but I went in with an open mind and did hear some things I needed to hear. Thank you!
Amazing course! I would strongly recommend this course for those who want to take their book writing and editing to the next level.

How do you think not to put subtitles in your course?. I am a Spanish speaker and I have been able to complete other courses because they have subtitles and I have been able to translate the course material. Yours is the first course I've bought and it doesn't have subtitles.
Very insightful and easy to follow. I also appreciated the bonus book recommendations. Thank you for everything.
Very good for new authors or writers looking to complete their first title.
I loved this course - a clear and focused path to success for someone who has a story to tell.
Information that is to the point and useful.
Never paid this much for a 2-hour ted talk with Fiverr ads in the middle.

I've always wanted to write a book, and this course has given me some simple yet incredible ways to make my dream a reality. You won't regret it! I recommend this course to anyone wanting to write a book and/or get into ghostwriting.
The information here is set out in succinct fashion and has a deliberate goal in conveying the process that can get you the writer to a finish line and your book a possibility.
A total waste of my money. This course is for absolute beginners who have never written half a word in their lives.

I was completely satisfied with the content and smooth flow of the course, which helped me clearly understand the necessary steps to successfully create a high quality Ebook.  I feel much more confident proceeding with the process and using the resources from the course to help guide me!!!  I would recommend the course for all people planning to create an Ebook, collaborate with a ghostwriter, or self-publish a book or Ebook.  Excellent resource and value!
This taught me a few things that I did not know in terms of Amazon and what not but, this is for people who want to hire a ghostwriter not real writers
Great all around course
Very helpful
Concise and very informative!
Professional!

Very high quality training video. I was unaware of Fiver's learning program as i had not paid much attention to it in the past. I have knowledge already about publishing E-Books but i have to say even still, there are some gems of wisdom in this course. Kudos - I will be studying a few more after I have completed this one
Very easy to understand!
Great course. I highly recommend it.

The course provided a lot of information in regards to drafting, writing, and style, but for a course marketed as Create and Publish your Book or eBook, I wanted more information on the publishing side. It felt like the majority of the course was on creativity and outlining and figuring out the audience, but only one part was dedicated to all of editing and self-publishing. I think a better title would have been Creating Your Book or eBook from Start to Finish. I don't regret taking the course, but most of the information given consisted of information I had already learned. If you're new to writing, editing, or publishing, then this is the course for you.
Really useful course!!
Nice ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
very interesting  the process of writing

Easy steps and very informative without using complicated words or treating you like an idiot.  It is well paced and anyone can understand what he is saying and the point he's putting across without feeling overwhelmed or confused at any point
Its so amazing , knowledgeable and upbringing
Good info, just a little bit on the boring side delivery wise but otherwise very clear and concise. I would buy other courses from this presenter for sure.
Good!

There is something about this course that may come across as banal, in a way that these notions should be commonly known to any writer, but it actually makes you think, "was I doing it right?". Many good hints. Thanks!
Amazing
Aprochable

In my opinion, the best chapter in this course was chapter 6. I haven't read any of the books that Billy recommends for writers, but they sound good. Billy does a good job of speaking slowly and clearly, which makes it easy for the listener to hear what he's saying.
Great content!

The program was all-inclusive, with step-by-step instructions for every part of making a book. From coming up with an idea to publishing it, the course gave useful tips and insights. The teacher knew what he was talking about and was excited about it, which made learning both interesting and useful. Now I feel like I have the power and tools to make my literary idea come to life and share it with the world. Highly suggested for people who want to write books.

This course is a very helpful overview. The instructor offers tips and practical advice throughout the process. The course is well organized and I learned a lot. I like the promotion of Fiverr for assistance throughout the process too.
